text: Russell Paul Kemmerer (November 1, 1930 – December 8, 2014) was an American professional baseball player. He was a right-handed pitcher. He played for the Boston Red Sox (–), the Washington Senators (–), the Chicago White Sox (–), and the Houston Colt .45s (–) to finish his career. Kemmerer died in Indianapolis, Indiana, aged 84. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh
title: Russ Kemmerer
